briefdescription.para: Update interface state (call in main loop)

detaileddescription.para: Handles port state updates, blinking, OLED updates, and sleep management

briefdescription.para: Set port directions for all 16 ports.

directionMask
Bit mask where 0=input, 1=output
Configures which ports are inputs vs outputs

modeMask
Bit mask where 0=normal, 1=inverted

portNames

briefdescription.para: Set name for a single port.

detaileddescription.para:
name
Human-readable port name
portNumber
Port number (0-15)

briefdescription.para: Write state to a named port.

portName
Name of the port to control
state
Desired state (true=high, false=low)
bool True if port exists and write successful

briefdescription.para: Write state to a numbered port.

portNumber
Port number (0-15)
state
Desired state (true=high, false=low)
bool True if write successful
Controls output port state using port number

briefdescription.para: Write states to multiple ports simultaneously.

portMask
16-bit mask representing desired port states

briefdescription.para: Set all output ports to specified state.

state
Desired state for all outputs
Controls all output ports simultaneously

briefdescription.para: Set all output ports to high state.

detaileddescription.para: Convenience method to set all outputs high

briefdescription.para: Set all output ports to low state.

detaileddescription.para: Convenience method to set all outputs low

portName
Name of the port
inverted
True to invert logic, false for normal

briefdescription.para: Set inversion mode for a numbered port.

detaileddescription.para:
portNumber
Port number (0-15)
inverted
True to invert logic, false for normal
Controls whether port logic is inverted

uint16_t 16-bit value representing all port states

portName
Name of the port to read

portNumber
Port number (0-15)

briefdescription.para: Check if port has inverted logic.

briefdescription.para: Get port number from port name.

briefdescription.para: Get port name from port number.

detaileddescription.para: Called when interrupt pin is triggered, reads and processes port changes

callback

briefdescription.para: Print current state of all ports to Serial.

briefdescription.para: Print complete port configuration to Serial.

detaileddescription.para: Shows direction, inversion, and name mappings for all ports

Milliseconds before sleep (-1 = never sleep)
Controls automatic OLED power saving

lines
Number of text lines to display (1-5)

buffer
Array of strings to display

Updates OLED display with provided text

Milliseconds display is on
timeOff
Milliseconds display is off
blinkOn
True to enable blinking
Controls OLED blinking for attention-getting displays

Powers up OLED display

newLine

Shows error symbol in circle filling the display

briefdescription.para: Interface class for PCF8575 I/O expander and OLED display.

detaileddescription.para: Provides comprehensive control over 16-bit I/O expander with named ports, interrupt handling, blinking control, and OLED display management
